examples.example: 这款新手机的性能非常出色，给我的生活带来了很多便利。

translate.english: The performance of this new mobile phone is extremely excellent, which has brought a lot of conveniences to my life.

examples.example: 这辆汽车的性能十分卓越，让驾驶体验更为舒适和流畅。

translate.english: The performance of this car is extremely excellent, making the driving experience more comfortable and smooth.

examples.example: 这款电脑的性能超棒，让我的工作效率大幅提高。

translate.english: The performance of this computer is excellent, which greatly improves my work efficiency.
